processing_structure.text: Specify input and output (one integer, sum of its divisors)
Loop from 1 to the input value to check divisors and add them to sum

advice.text: You have started coding; finish translating the remaining comments into code by implementing the loop and the output.
Plan the loop: iterate i from 1 through n, check divisibility using the modulo operation, and add i to sum when it divides n.
Write the loop body that updates sum for each divisor, then print the final sum and run the program on a few sample inputs to check results.
